full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DMIGS BRTZE MA DANG 'BREL BA'I DRAG PO GSUM BSGRIL KYI BYABS KHRUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES BUM CHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS DUS 'DIR RGYANG PO DANG TZAN LA SOGS SDE BRGYAD DRANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYI 'TSE BA'I 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG ,DGOS MCHOD DPON PA SHE DAR PI LIG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHING PA'O RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS LCAGS KHYI DBYAR ZLA THA MA'I TSES BCU BDUN LA TSE TSIG THU NVA GVA'I ZHES PA'I MCHAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
